page.title: 11Alderney Week.
page.content: The first week in August is set aside for Alderney Week.Alderney Week is designed both for locals to have fun and to attract tourists in many ways. The local people help as much as they possibly can.They help with games and stalls , organise events and prepare drinks and food, sweets, toffee apples etc. Some of the regular events are _{ Miss Alderney,Daft Raft Race ,Safari, Cavalcade,plays,Man_powered Flight,talent show, odd spot competition ,torch light procession, baby show and swimming sports.The tennis courts are open to have a game.There are beach parties. The great thing for the children is Percy Penguin, and the mini-marathon. For one week the variety of events belie the small size of the island's population.
